section:
The temple of Elnir is a majestic palace of black marble inlaid with veins of gold. Elnir is the foremost god of the pantheon, the patron of warlords and kings. His realm is said to lie between the mountains and the sky, and whenever there is a storm the simple folk say, ‘Something has angered Elnir.’
